means: (Mount)阿勒山（土耳其东部）（一译“亚拉腊”，据基督教<圣经>载，大洪水后诺亚方舟即停于此）

sentence.Network_en: From Mount Ararat , Shem traveled west. Genetic data reflects a clear picture of this journey.
sentence.Network_cn: 挪亚一家在亚拉猎山解散后, 闪往西走, 基因资料清楚显示这个支系的移动方向.

means.word_mean: 1. the mountain peak that Noah's ark landed on as the waters of the great flood receded
